home.pageDescription: Software Developer from Hamburg and apprentice at Fricke.
home.aboutMe: My name is Jan, and I am a Software Developer from Hamburg, Germany. I am currently completing an apprenticeship as an IT Specialist in Application Development at the Fricke Group.

general.title: 1. General Information
general.body: This website serves as a personal portfolio and is operated by a private individual. Protecting your personal data is an important concern for me. I handle your personal data confidentially and in accordance with the statutory data protection regulations, in particular the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR).

hosting.title: 3. Hosting
hosting.body: This website is hosted by an external provider (Vercel Inc.). When you visit the website, this provider automatically collects data about accesses and stores them in so-called server log files. Processing is carried out for the technical delivery and security of the website on the basis of Art. 6 para. 1 lit. f GDPR (legitimate interest in a stable and secure operation of the website).

provider.label: Provider
provider.name: Vercel Inc.
provider.address: 440 N Barranca Avenue #4133, Covina, CA 91723, USA

analytics.title: 4.1 Web Analytics
analytics.body: Simple Analytics is used for anonymized analysis of the use of this website. No personal data such as IP addresses or cookies are used. The collected data only provides insights into aggregated metrics (e.g., page views, device types).
analytics.legalBasis: Legal basis: Art. 6 para. 1 lit. f GDPR (legitimate interest in the anonymized evaluation of user behavior).

github.title: 4.2 GitHub API
github.body: The public GitHub API is used to display GitHub repositories and profile data. No personal data of visitors is transmitted to GitHub; all data comes exclusively from my own GitHub account.

provider.name: GitHub Inc.
provider.address: 88 Colin P Kelly Jr St, San Francisco, CA 94107, USA

rights.title: 5. Rights of the Data Subject
rights.intro: As a data subject, you have the following rights:
items: Restriction of processing according to Art. 18 GDPR
Objection to processing according to Art. 21 GDPR
Data portability according to Art. 20 GDPR
rights.contactHint: To exercise your rights, please contact me by email at the address provided above.

changes.title: 6. Changes to This Privacy Policy
changes.body: I reserve the right to update this privacy policy in the event of changes to the website or due to legal requirements.

specialMsg.underConstruction: This website is still under construction.
